mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_user(user_name, user_birthday, user_salary) VALUES(#{name}, #{birthday}, #{salary})
mapper.update: UPDATE s_user SET user_name=#{name}, user_birthday=#{birthday}, user_salary=#{salary} WHERE user_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id id, user_name name, user_birthday birthday, user_salary salary FROM s_user WHERE user_id=#{id}
